Overview¶

This is a quick overview of the pycurrency package

usage: Converting from one currency to another:

>>> from pycurrency import converter
>>> myconverter = converter.Converter(1,'USD','JMD')
>>> myconverter.result()
u'85.2878465'
>>> myconverter.ratio()
{'to': u'85.2878465', 'from': u'1'}
